Pre-Game Insights: South Africa and Bangladesh will face off in the 22nd game of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, Australia, 2022 on 27th October 2022 at the Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG), Sydney.
South Africa is currently ranked second on the points table, while Bangladesh is ranked third.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG), Sydney is a balanced pitch with an average 1st innings score of 157 runs.
Others: The match will be played at 08:30 AM IST.
Match Officials: Umpires: Langton Rusere (ZIM), Rod Tucker (AUS) and Ahsan Raza (PAK), Referee: Chris Broad (ENG-XI)
